content:
Certainly! Here is a description of the Magic the Gathering card "Lightning Bolt," excluding the set, artist, and card number:

Card Name: Lightning Bolt

Mana Cost: 1R

Card Type: Instant

Card Text: Lightning Bolt deals 3 damage to any target.

Flavor Text: "The spark of life is the flame of death." -The Hurloon minotaurs

Rarity: Common

I hope this description provides the information you were looking for! Please let me know if you have any further questions.
